columns.name: TimeGenerated
columns.description: The timestamp (UTC) reflecting the time in which the event was generated.

columns.name: AgentId
columns.description: Unique identifier for the Cortex XDR agent installed on the endpoint.

columns.name: AgentStatus
columns.description: Current status of the Cortex XDR agent (e.g., active, inactive, disconnected).

columns.name: OperationalStatus
columns.description: Operational state of the endpoint (e.g., online, offline).

columns.name: HostName
columns.description: Name of the host machine where the Cortex XDR agent is installed.

columns.name: AgentType
columns.description: Type of Cortex XDR agent (e.g., Windows, macOS, Linux).

columns.name: IpAddress
columns.description: IP address of the host machine, stored as a dynamic object.

columns.name: LastSeen
columns.description: Timestamp of when the agent was last seen active, in Unix epoch format.

columns.name: Tags
columns.description: Tags or labels associated with the endpoint, stored as a dynamic object.

columns.name: Users
columns.description: List of users associated with the endpoint, stored as a dynamic object.
